title: since about 3 weeks i don't get audio in teams-for-linux
body: **Describe the bug** audio output in teams-for-linux is no more working, problem appeared about 3 weeks ago chat is working without problem, my corespondent hear me if i launch teams inside browser firefox or chrome audio is working normally **To Reproduce** launch teams-for-linux in shell windows ``` > type teams-for-linux teams-for-linux is /snap/bin/teams-for-linux ``` **Expected behavior** get audio working in teams-for-linux app **Screenshots** If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem. **Desktop (please complete the following information):** - OS: opensuse 15.5 - Installation package : snap - Version [e.g. 0.1.17] I use teams-for-linux on opensuse 15.5 installed with snap as described at `https://snapcraft.io/install/teams-for-linux/opensuse ` ``` > rpm -qf /usr/bin/snap snapd-2.62-lp155.1.1.x86_64 ``` **Debug** When possible, please run the application from the terminal using `--webDebug` and try to reproduce the error. The provide in this section the output from both the terminal and the browser debug console. ```bash teams-for-linux --webDebug --appLogLevels=error,info,warn,debug ``` ``` rernen@xh-rene:~> teams-for-linux --webDebug --appLogLevels=error,info,warn,debug update.go:85: cannot change mount namespace according to change mount (/var/lib/snapd/hostfs/boot /boot none bind,ro 0 0): permission denied [DEBUG] configPath:,/home/rernen/snap/teams-for-linux/583/.config/teams-for-linux [WARN] No config file found, using default values [DEBUG] configFile:,[object Object] dbus-send: /snap/teams-for-linux/583/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libdbus-1.so.3: version `LIBDBUS_PRIVATE_1.12.20' not found (required by dbus-send) (teams-for-linux:8648): Gtk-WARNING **: 09:35:12.132: Theme parsing error: gtk.css:3536:25: 'font-feature-settings' is not a valid property name Gtk-Message: 09:35:12.158: Failed to load module "colorreload-gtk-module" Gtk-Message: 09:35:12.159: Failed to load module "window-decorations-gtk-module" [DEBUG] Custom background service url is 'http://localhost' [DEBUG] processArgs:,/snap/teams-for-linux/583/teams-for-linux,--webDebug,--appLogLevels=error,info,warn,debug,--no-sandbox [DEBUG] Testing network using net.request() for https://teams.microsoft.com/ [DEBUG] Spellchecker is disabled! (teams-for-linux:8648): Gtk-WARNING **: 09:35:16.825: Theme parsing error: gtk.css:3536:25: 'font-feature-settings' is not a valid property name [DEBUG] Network test successful with method https [DEBUG] GetSystemIdleState => IdleTimeout: 300s, IdleTimeoutPollInterval: 10s, ActiveCheckPollInterval: 2s, IdleTime: 0s, IdleState: 'active' [DEBUG] did-frame-finish-load,[object Object],true [DEBUG]
